synset.def: at or on or to the masthead or upper rigging of a ship

synset.def: insofar as the circumstances are concerned

floridly figurative prose

synset.def: with regard to fundamentals although not concerning details

synset.def: so as to disappear or approach zero

synset.def: to or toward the inside of
synset.example: come in

synset.def: in a manner designed for heavy duty

synset.def: changing suddenly in direction and degree
synset.example: the road twists sharply after the light

synset.def: sharing equally with another or others

synset.def: in a manner that is pleasing to the senses

synset.def: from a source of previously owned goods

synset.def: toward the posterior end of the body

magnetically contaminated material
the forge belched redly at the sky

synset.def: so as to leave much space or distance between

synset.def: before another in time, space, or importance
synset.example: I was here first

synset.def: in an outstanding manner or to an outstanding degree

synset.def: used with question words to convey surprise
synset.example: what on earth are you doing?

synset.def: in a menacing or scowling way

synset.def: from one place or situation to another

synset.def: in or as if in pain

synset.def: from a position of superiority or authority

synset.def: in a setting where one is or feels inappropriate or incongruous

synset.def: not symmetrically with respect to the center

synset.def: in an irreparable manner or to an irreparable degree
